alert.note: Alert for Colbert (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 3:45PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lauderdale and southern Colbert Counties through 415 PM CST... At 345 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Cherokee, or 13 miles east of Tishomingo State Park, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Muscle Shoals, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Underwood-Petersville, Red Rock, Posey Loop, Pride Landing, Srygley Church and New Bethel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for northwestern Alabama.
